item.title: Aggressive parking warden, 24th October
item.description:
The parking warden on duty at 11am on Thursday 23rd October was incredibly aggressive in telling me to move my car. I had just finished feeding my 8 month old baby. He told me he didn’t care and that I was costing the council money. He then started telling another motorist how out of line I was. It was very intimidating.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 11, Coleherne Road, Earl's Court, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Estate lighting is not working, 24th October
item.description:

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Overbury Street, Hackney, London

item.title: Offensive language on Stop Sign, 24th October
item.description:

item.title: Three England flags attached to lampposts on Langley Road, Welling (near number 30), 24th October
item.description:
There are three England flags attached to lampposts along Langley Road, near number 30 in Welling. These appear to be unauthorised attachments on council street furniture and have no business being there. They do not appear to be part of any official event or display and may make some residents feel uncomfortable. Please could the council arrange for their removal as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Langley Road, West Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Area needs to be closed, 24th October
item.description:
A sealed up entry to a gap between building was opened and has now become a dumping ground. Bikes, wooden pallets, road safety equipment and rubbish and being dumped here. The area needs to be sealed off to prevent further fly tipping.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Clapton Terrace, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rough sleeping with lots of litter for months, 24th October

item.title: Abandoned car for a long time, 24th October
item.description:
This CAR is abandoned by previous tenants of one of the Hamlet house flats. It hasn't been moved for over half a year. Our community tried to reach the owner but unsuccessfully. Car is not taxed or insured. Also inside is like a junk box.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Glenure Road, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet
